title: Illicit Dose Of Scars
description: Journee Lark WatsonI was eighteen When tragedy struck I escaped into my modeling careerBut that wasn’t enoughSo I found a band’s lyrics To help me healTo help me find solaceTo help me find my placeKnox Ace FosterI grew up bullied and bruisedUntil I found the guitarAnd it became my museI started a band, we played many showsBut one thing, little did I know was missingI met her and my world changed She helped me find meShe helped me stay sane*This is a Rockstar Romance for 18+. It has dark themes, graphic sex scenes with sexually coarse language, profanity, dubcon/noncon scenes, and other mature content.*
author: Regina Ann Faith
